author: James Van Straten
title: Strategy Shifts Capital Raise to Preferred Stocks as Common Share Issuance Loses Allure
description: Sales of STRK and STRF preferred shares allow Strategy to fund bitcoin purchases without diluting common shareholders.
content: Disclaimer: The analyst who wrote this piece owns shares of Strategy (MSTR).Over the past two weeks, Strategy (MSTR) has refrained from utilizing the at-the-market (ATM) equity program on its common … [+1931 chars]
